v0Prompt: Create an elegant portfolio landing page for 'Regis AI Suite' - a collection of 5 AI applications. Use a sophisticated dark theme (#0a0f0d) with purple (#8b5cf6) and green (#00ff41) accents. Include: 1) Hero section with headline 'The Regis AI Suite' and animated particles background. 2) Project cards grid showing all 5 apps (ClaudeHydra, GeminiHydra, Regis Claude Master, Tissaia, Keira) with icons, descriptions, feature tags, and 'View Project' buttons. Each card should have its own accent color. 3) Statistics section with 4 counters (5 Apps, 12 Agents, 6+ Providers, 50K+ LoC) using animated number counters. 4) Shared tech stack section with technology logos in a horizontal scrolling marquee. 5) 'Regis Architecture' principles section with 4 cards (Precision, Elegance, Security, Performance). 6) Footer with GitHub link and author credit. Use Inter font, glassmorphism cards, smooth hover animations, and responsive grid layout.
